name: HomeAssistantDashboard
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home automation
des:
Open the Home Assistant Dashboard with voice

INSTRUCTIONS:

 Install the Skill.
 Say 'Open home automation'.
 The first time it will open the settings, enter the data and save.

Now you're ready to open the dashboard by saying 'Alexa, open home automation'.
To open the settings, you have to say 'Alexa, ask home automation the settings.'

SETTINGS:
"IP:" Here you can set an IP or URL
"Port:" This is the port, default is 8123
"PROTOCOL:" Choose between http or https (default is http)

Kiosk Mode:
"FULL:" Removes both the top and bottom bars
"HEADER:" This mode allows you to remove the top bar (False or True)
"SIDEBAR:" This mode allows you to remove the sidebar (False or True)

*Note: You can find the Local IP of your home assistant by using certain apps or programs to scan all devices connected to your router.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
